DialogTextUnknownNPCDay0D.comment: catch-all if npc00 is somehow referenced
DialogTextUnknownNPCDay0D.text: If you see this then I really messed up.

DialogTextErynDay05.text: My ride is coming late.^|This place is OK to hang out in.

DialogTextErynDay07.text: So you're not the only weirdo^|wandering around after close.

DialogTextErynDay09.text: I wonder why D.B. is being like this?

DialogTextCarlDay00.comment: Carl is talking to a customer on day00
DialogTextCarlDay00.text: Sorry, I'll be with you next.

DialogTextCarlDay02.comment: Carl is talking to a customer on day02
DialogTextCarlDay02.text: Sorry, it might be a while.

DialogTextCarlDay04.text: Really, I'm sorry for being creepy.

DialogTextCarlDay08.text: I don't talk to D.B. often.^|He's not here late every night.^|He must close up early if it's slow.

DialogTextCarlDay0A.text: There are many last minute shoppers today.

DialogTextFrankDay00.comment: hanging around the mall in the AM

DialogTextFrankDay08.comment: hanging around the mall in the AM
DialogTextFrankDay08.text: I visit all the malls in my district.^|This is definitely the smallest.^|Maybe it started as a bigger idea.^|And that was too much to finish.^|I hope it gets an expansion.

DialogTextCarolDay04.text: I've worked here a long time.^|But I only work seasonal jobs.^|I don't about the mall's history.

DialogTextCarolDay06.text: Are you doing two jobs now?

DialogTextCarolDay08.text: I thought we'd be busier today.

DialogTextCarolDay0A.text: It's the last day we'll be here.

DialogTextLisaDay00.text: It's way too slow here tonight.

DialogTextLisaDay01.text: I hope your store is doing better than us.

DialogTextLisaDay02.comment: only dialog is in scripted events this day

DialogTextLisaDay06.comment: no default text - used in story events

DialogTextLisaDay07.text: You look really tired tonight.^|Oh, sorry for saying that.

DialogTextLisaDay08.text: Your shift is over.^|Did you forget something?

DialogTextLisaDay09.text: Was that your DM in the mall today?

DialogTextLisaDay0A.comment: only in story events this day

DialogTextLisaDay0B.text: Hey Carl, Merry Xmas.^|Or I hope it is.

DialogTextGrunbergDay00.text: Let me know if you need anything.

DialogTextGrunbergDay02.text: What an odd thing to ask about.|Someone is worrying too much.

DialogTextGrunbergDay03.text: That was all so long ago.

DialogTextGrunbergDay04.text: Sorry, can't be of more help.

DialogTextGrunbergDay06.text: What errand are you on today?

DialogTextGrunbergDay07.text: You seem worn out tonight Carl.

DialogTextGrunbergDay08.text: Asking about D.B.?^|He worked here last year.^|Good guy, a little odd at times.

DialogTextGrunbergDay09.text: I know you'll make the best choice.

DialogTextGrunbergDay0A.text: A lot of kids are getting new consoles this year.

DialogTextGrunbergDay0B.text: Day after xmas will be our busiest of the year.

DialogTextGrunbergDay0D.text: I hope you don't miss this place.

DialogTextJenDay00.text: You must be new here.^|Please stop by when you're on break.

DialogTextJenDay01.text: Sorry, have to do inventory.^|Let's hang out another night.

DialogTextJenDay02.text: Oh my, what is she looking for?

DialogTextJenDay03.text: You're looking for someone?^|Sorry, just me here tonight.

DialogTextJenDay04.text: That's an odd thing to ask about.

DialogTextJenDay05.text: Stop by another night when you're free.

DialogTextJenDay06.text: What are you doing this time?

DialogTextJenDay08.comment: only in story events this day

DialogTextJenDay09.text: If you're so curious, go check it out.

DialogTextJenDay0B.text: You seem troubled tonight.^|I hope everything is OK.

DialogTextJenDay0C.comment: only in story events this day

DialogTextJenDay0D.comment: only in story events this day

DialogTextGriffyDay00.text: Uh, I think we're, what's it called?|All out of that.

DialogTextGriffyDay04.text: I, uh, have only been here since..^|Wait, um, I don't know.

DialogTextGriffyDay08.text: Do you, uh, want like fries with that?^|Oh, wait. Yeah, right. Uh..^|We don't have fries.

DialogTextScottDay00.text: We still sell 8-track players.|Won't find them anywhere else in 1990.

DialogTextScottDay03.text: I thought I heard someone go by.^|I guess it was just you.

DialogTextScottDay05.text: Interested in a high speed casette dubbing system?

DialogTextScottDay06.text: I know cable is popular, but I think giant rooftop antennas will made a comeback.

DialogTextScottDay08.text: You look like someone who would use a hi-gain signal amp.

DialogTextScottDay0A.text: A 40 function scientific calculator makes a great last minute gift.

DialogTextScottDay0C.text: We ran out of batteries by 9:01.

DialogTextToddDay00.text: You must be the new one Lisa mentioned.

DialogTextToddDay01.text: I don't need any help tonight.^|Thanks for checking though.

DialogTextToddDay02.text: Lisa talked to me last night.^|Wish I could help.

DialogTextToddDay03.text: I didn't see anyone like that.^|I doubt he would shop here.

DialogTextToddDay04.text: I haven't been here that long.^|It's only been.. 4 years.^|Really, 4 years already?^|Sorry, I can't help you.

DialogTextToddDay06.text: I hope you're getting paid extra.

DialogTextToddDay08.text: I tried talking Lisa down, no luck.^|She is really worked up about something.

DialogTextToddDay0A.text: Is your store busy today?^|We're doing alright.

DialogTextToddDay0C.text: Only hours until my new year party.^|I think this will be the best.

DialogTextElizaDay00.text: Sorry, nothing new came in today.^|At least nothing good.

DialogTextElizaDay01.text: Just give me a little more time.^|I'll figure you out.

DialogTextElizaDay02.text: That's all I have for you.

DialogTextElizaDay03.text: Looking for someone else?^|I see how it is with you.

DialogTextElizaDay04.text: This is just my second year here.^|I hope it's the last.

DialogTextElizaDay05.text: I don't think that quiz worked.

DialogTextElizaDay07.text: The good times never last forever.

DialogTextElizaDay0B.text: You can still change your mind.

DialogTextElizaDay0D.text: You're too normal for your own good.^|Stop by if you're in town again.

DialogTextBeckyDay00.text: Is this your first day?.^|That is so exciting!

DialogTextBeckyDay03.text: It's taking forever to clean up tonight.

DialogTextBeckyDay04.text: I just started last year.^|Thanks for asking!

DialogTextBeckyDay07.text: It can get scary here after close.

DialogTextBeckyDay08.text: I hope my old van starts tonight.

DialogTextBeckyDay0C.text: I can't believe it's the end of 1990!

DialogTextCharlesDay0B.text: Last year was something.^|I only heard about it though.

DialogTextCharlesDay0C.text: I hope D.B. is opening the arcade tonight.

DialogTextCharlesDay0D.text: Hey, great job with the store.^|I miss it, just a little, sometimes.

DialogTextRandyDay00.text: The new camping guy is alright.^|He likes the outdoors as much as me.

DialogTextRandyDay01.text: Happy to talk, but not tonight.

DialogTextRandyDay02.text: No, but that is a weird thing to ask.

DialogTextRandyDay04.text: Our store opened last year.^|I can't imagine any of us can help.

DialogTextRandyDay08.text: I can't until it's slow again,^|and I can get back to my hobby.

DialogTextDBDay03.text: Please leave me out of this.

DialogTextDBDay04.text: This is just a regular mall.^|I wouldn't poke around too much.

DialogTextDBDay06.text: It's tricky to figure out the right combo.

DialogTextDaniDay0A.text: Slacking on your job I see.

DialogTextDaniDay0B.comment: only in story events this day

DialogTextDaniDay0C.text: Last day already?^|Not a bad idea to move on.

DialogTextGuardDay01.text: I don't know what he's up to.

DialogTextGuardDay02.text: Anything I saw is private mall info.

DialogTextGuardDay03.text: Let me know if you find him.

DialogTextGuardDay04.text: Mall history? I'm just the guard.

DialogTextGuardDay05.text: I haven't seen that guy today.

DialogTextGuardDay08.text: Did you see some shaggy guy go by?

DialogTextGuardDay09.text: Too many people around this late.^|Go home already all of you.

DialogTextGuardDay0A.text: So many people to watch today

DialogTextGuardDay0B.text: This better not be like last year.

DialogTextGuardDay0C.text: Made it through the year without any trouble.

DialogTextGuardDay0D.text: You all need to move on.^|I have plans tonight.^|No, really, I do.

DialogTextBillyDay00.text: What? He said I could wait here.

DialogTextBillyDay04.comment: in the camping section this day
DialogTextBillyDay04.text: Will he let me take a nap here?

DialogTextBillyDay06.comment: in the fishing section this day
DialogTextBillyDay06.text: Do you know how these work?

DialogTextBillyDay08.text: I'm not allowed to watch this one.

DialogTextAlDay0B.text: This work is very important.^|You wouldn't understand.

DialogTextAlDay0D.text: We have even bigger plans for 1991.

DialogTextThomasDay02.comment: Why are you asking me this?
DialogTextThomasDay02.text: What do you want? I'm very busy here.

DialogTextThomasDay03.text: I don't care who you're looking for.|They're not here.

DialogTextThomasDay04.text: How old do you think I am?

DialogTextThomasDay05.text: Why are you here after close?|I have to wait until everyone is gone.

DialogTextThomasDay07.text: You don't get it, we're closed.

DialogTextThomasDay08.text: Are you here to shop or annoy me?

DialogTextThomasDay09.text: Please stop coming here at night.

DialogTextThomasDay0B.text: It's taking them forever to close.

DialogTextHeatherDay00.text: I really like the new camping guy.|I learned a ton from him already.

DialogTextGaryDay0D.text: I don't have time for you.

DialogTextGrantDay00.text: I don't know if you remember me.|I was friends with your parents.|Don't be a stranger.

DialogTextGrantDay01.text: Thanks for the help last week.

DialogTextGrantDay04.text: Even when things go wrong,|you can have fun with your friends.

DialogTextGrantDay05.text: No one is living here this year.

DialogTextGrantDay06.text: Nice of you to say hello.

DialogTextGrantDay07.text: Is everything OK?|You seem a little off.

DialogTextGrantDay08.text: It's a miracle we didn't get lost.

DialogTextGrantDay09.text: I know, those tents look cozy.|They're meant for outdoors though.|Camping inside, who'd do that?

DialogTextGrantDay0A.text: I hope that didn't bore you.

DialogTextBrettDay0B.text: You're not going to bust me right?

DialogTextBrettDay0D.text: Oh, and thanks for not turning me in.

DialogTextNickyDay01.text: Thanks for delivering my order.|Now I have something to do at night.

DialogTextNickyDay02.text: I haven't been here that long.|I don't know what's even normal.

DialogTextNickyDay04.text: Maybe I should bring a lunch.

DialogTextNickyDay08.text: Thanks, I thought he'd never leave.

DialogTextNickyDay0C.text: So sad you're leaving. Take care.

DialogTextTanyaDay01.text: This thing takes forever to finish.

DialogTextTanyaDay03.text: I didn't let anyone in after close.

DialogTextTanyaDay04.text: We just opened a month ago.|I don't know anything before that.

DialogTextTanyaDay06.text: I wish we had smarter customers.

DialogTextTanyaDay07.text: Is something wrong tonight?|You look flustered tonight.

DialogTextTanyaDay08.text: Busy days just fly by here.

DialogTextTanyaDay0D.text: Bye Carl, it was nice to meet you.

DialogTextCraigDay00.text: I didn't think anyone would find me.

DialogTextCraigDay02.text: I barely see anything back here.

DialogTextCraigDay03.text: I'm trying to finish cleaning. Sorry.

DialogTextCraigDay04.text: I'm barely old enough to work.

DialogTextCraigDay05.text: I still have a lot to do.

DialogTextCraigDay0C.text: This is your last day? Mine too.

DialogTextJuanDay00.text: Poor kid is stuck here all day.

DialogTextJuanDay02.text: Nope, just a regular day here.

DialogTextJuanDay04.text: We came to this mall all the time.|They had Santa back here last year.|Before that it was a dept store.

DialogTextJuanDay06.text: Maybe it's just just me but..|are some of the shoppers not very bright?

DialogTextJuanDay0D.text: This is the best new years idea ever.

DialogTextLauraDay00.text: Most people just like to look.

DialogTextLauraDay01.text: We had some odd types today.

DialogTextLauraDay05.text: Thanks for stopping by.|Everything is good here tonight.

DialogTextLauraDay07.text: I'm glad someone figured it out.

DialogTextLauraDay0B.text: I hope you have a good xmas.

DialogTextLauraDay0D.text: Maybe I'll make it out to your mall.

DialogTextGinaDay02.text: We get all types asking questions.|You'll have to be more specific.

DialogTextGinaDay04.text: This is my first year here.

DialogTextGinaDay06.text: Did you find a trade for that scarf?

DialogTextGinaDay08.text: I can't believe PogoDawg started a delivery service & didn't tell me.

DialogTextGinaDay0A.text: Last year this was where Santa is now.|Was that a better spot I wonder?

DialogTextGinaDay0C.text: There are some exciting changes|planned for next year.

DialogTextSantaDay00.text: It's OK, any age can visit Santa.

DialogTextSantaDay02.text: This Santa doesn't keep a naughty list.

DialogTextSantaDay04.text: It's a different Santa every year.|Don't tell the kids though.

DialogTextSantaDay06.text: Those turtle toys are very popular.

DialogTextSantaDay08.text: Can the elves can make so many Game Boys?

DialogTextSantaDay0A.text: Only a couple hours left now.

DialogTextLostGuyDay00.comment: in the fishing section this day
DialogTextLostGuyDay00.text: Do these work on land too?

DialogTextLostGuyDay04.text: I hope they have pizza slices.

DialogTextLostGuyDay06.comment: in the appliances section this day
DialogTextLostGuyDay06.text: Will this fit in my kitchen?

DialogTextLostGuyDay08.text: Why don't they sell wires here.

DialogTextLostGuyDay0A.text: Where's the girl from last year?

DialogTextLostGuyDay0C.comment: in the audio section this day

DialogTextRockerDay00.comment: in story event, no other dialog

DialogTextRockerDay04.text: I'm going to finally win this.

DialogTextRockerDay0A.text: I know this is awful.|But what choice is there?

DialogTextRockerDay0C.comment: at the info desk this day
DialogTextRockerDay0C.text: Will there be new stores next year?

DialogTextShopperDay00.comment: in the record store this day
DialogTextShopperDay00.text: I don't know if this is worth $15

DialogTextShopperDay02.text: I know this place is bad.|I wish there was another option.

DialogTextShopperDay06.text: I don't think I'll find a gift here.

DialogTextShopperDay08.text: I can't decide which if these looks better.

DialogTextShopperDay0A.comment: at the appliances section this day
DialogTextShopperDay0A.text: Maybe if I get a bigger place..

DialogTextBusyMomDay00.comment: in story event, no other dialog

DialogTextBusyMomDay04.comment: in the appliances section this day

DialogTextBusyMomDay06.text: Where can I find normal clothes?

DialogTextBusyMomDay08.comment: in the tv section this day

DialogTextBusyMomDay0A.comment: at the fishing section this day

DialogTextBusyMomDay0C.text: It came with only one controller.|And now they're sold out.

DialogTextMallratDay02.text: This isn't really my thing..|but it's so popular right now.

DialogTextMallratDay04.comment: in the audio section this day
DialogTextMallratDay04.text: Do you also work here?|That guy isn't much help.

DialogTextMallratDay06.text: Is this based on the music video?

DialogTextMallratDay08.text: I like all the new dress colors.

DialogTextMallratDay0A.comment: used in story event this day

DialogTextMallratDay0C.text: After xmas is the best time to shop.

DialogTextPreppyDay00.text: There's no way you work here.

DialogTextPreppyDay02.text: I wonder if they have it...

DialogTextPreppyDay0A.comment: used in story event - no other dialog

DialogTextPreppyDay0C.text: I've never been to this part of the mall.

DialogTextYuppieDay00.comment: in the appliances section this day
DialogTextYuppieDay00.text: An ice maker would be nice.|It would save me hours.

DialogTextYuppieDay02.comment: in the audio section this day
DialogTextYuppieDay02.text: I want something with a modern look.

DialogTextYuppieDay06.comment: in the south hall this day

DialogTextYuppieDay08.text: I don't think he'd wear this.

DialogTextYuppieDay0A.text: Hmm, any good last minute gifts..

DialogTextYuppieDay0C.text: This is the one I was looking for.

DialogTextNelsonDay0D.text: Don't worry about me.|I can handle closing solo.

DialogTextAlOldDay0B.text: She needs to mind her own business.

DialogTextAlOldDay0D.text: Why are you poking around here?

DialogTextHiddenHJDay0C.text: It's too bad, I have all of these already.|It was still worth the visit though.

DialogTextHiddenMJDay0C.text: I came all the way here & still can't|find the Kathleen|Sunfire book.
